item.title: 中国通过掩盖真实外资流数据培育股市反弹
item.description: 中国最早将于下周一关闭外资流入股市的直播系统，这是通过消除负面数据的潜在来源来支撑信心的最新政策举措。【原文：China is set to switch off a live feed of foreign flows for stocks as early as Monday, the latest policy move to shore up confidence by removing a potential source of negative data.】

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡就加沙战争辱骂哥伦比亚总统
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡抨击了哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-佩特罗，因为这位南美领导人要求就加沙战争逮捕他。【原文：Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu attacked Colombian President Gustavo Petro after the South American leader called for his arrest over the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 核心通胀降温对美联储的缓解作用微乎其微
item.description: 美国 4 月份的基本通胀率可能在 6 个月以来首次出现放缓，这为物价压力在经历了一连串意外上扬之后开始再次缓解带来了一线希望。【原文：Underlying US inflation probably moderated in April for the first time in six months, offering a ray of hope that price pressures will start to ease again after a string of upside surprises.】

item.title: 快速休闲餐饮业因消费者挣扎而受到伤害
item.description: 不断上涨的住房成本和居高不下的通胀率让许多消费者深受其害，而他们的钱包受到的打击现在也在伤害着美国的低成本餐馆。【原文：Rising housing costs and stubbornly high inflation are battering many consumers and the hit to their wallets is now hurting America’s low-cost restaurants.】

item.title: 6000 亿美元的债务墙笼罩着市场上风险最高的股票
item.description: 美国小盘股的价格是几十年来最便宜的，但由于未来五年的债务将超过 5 万亿美元，美联储必须发出重大的风险信号才能吸引投资者。【原文：US small-cap stocks are as cheap as they’ve been in decades, but with a more than half-trillion dollar mountain of debt looming over the next five years, it’s going to take a significant risk-on signal from the Federal Reserve to entice investors.】

item.title: 盎格鲁投资者要求公司加快步伐以应对必和必拓的竞购
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的股东们正在推动该公司加快发布其扭亏为盈计划，因为这家拥有107年历史的矿业公司正试图在必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）的收购要约中另辟蹊径。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s shareholders are pushing the company to speed up the release of its turnaround plan as the 107-year-old miner seeks to present an alternative to BHP Group Ltd.’s takeover bid.】

item.title: 加拿大油砂枢纽发布野火疏散警报
item.description: 加拿大油砂业务中心麦克默里堡正处于疏散警报之下，一场失控的大火在阿尔伯塔省城镇西南约 16 公里（10 英里）处肆虐。【原文：Fort McMurray, hub of Canada’s oil-sands operations, is under an evacuation alert as an out-of-control fire rages about 16 kilometers (10 miles) southwest of the Alberta town.】

item.title: 华尔街对 S&P 500 财报发出看涨信号
item.description: 分析师们以两年来最快的速度上调了对本季度的盈利预测，这表明美国企业利润下滑的最坏时期可能已经过去。【原文：Analysts are ratcheting up earnings forecasts for the current quarter at the swiftest pace in two years, suggesting that the worst of Corporate America’s profit slump may be firmly in the rear-view mirror.】

item.title: 伊拉克不会在下一次欧佩克+会议上同意继续削减石油产量
item.description: 伊拉克石油部长在巴格达对记者说，欧佩克第二大产油国伊拉克已经做出了足够的减产努力，不会支持在下一次欧佩克+会议上延长减产。【原文：Iraq, OPEC’s second-largest producer, has made enough production cuts and won’t support extending them at the next OPEC+ meeting, the country’s oil minister told reporters in Baghdad.】

item.title: 需求疲软，中国 4 月信贷意外收缩
item.description: 中国 4 月份信贷意外萎缩，反映出在央行不放松货币政策的情况下借贷需求疲软。【原文：China’s credit unexpectedly shrank in April, reflecting weak borrowing demand as the central bank refrained from easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 报告称印度豪宅占据更大销售份额
item.description: 根据房地产咨询公司 Anarock Group 的一份报告，过去五年来印度售出的豪宅比例增加了两倍。【原文：The share of luxury homes sold in India has tripled over the past five years, according to a report by property consultant Anarock Group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将从 2028 年 5 月起禁止活羊海运出口
item.description: 澳大利亚农业部长穆雷-瓦特（Murray Watt）表示，澳大利亚将从 2028 年 5 月起禁止通过海路出口活羊，并帮助受此决定影响的国家进行调整。【原文：Australia will ban the live export of sheep by sea from May 2028, and help those impacted by the decision to adjust, Agriculture Minister Murray Watt said.】

item.title: 英国央行进入历史上最缓慢的降息周期
item.description: 当中央银行开始降息时，它们通常会迅速采取行动。当由九名成员组成的货币政策委员会决定降低借贷成本的时机已到时，英格兰银行可能会选择一条更为谨慎的道路。【原文：When central banks start cutting interest rates, they usually move quickly. The Bank of England may choose a more cautious path when its nine-member Monetary Policy Committee decides the time has come to reduce borrowing costs.】

item.title: 科威特统治者解散议会，修改宪法
item.description: 科威特国家通讯社（KUNA）周五晚间称，科威特统治者解散了这个海湾国家的议会，并暂停执行宪法部分条款长达四年。【原文：Kuwait’s ruler dissolved the Gulf state’s parliament and suspended parts of the constitution for up to four years, state news agency KUNA said overnight Friday.】

item.title: 加州州长寻求更快行动平息保险危机
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）表示，他希望立法者加快保险公司提高费率的审批程序，并称对该州市场的全面改革耗时过长。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom said he wants lawmakers to expedite the approval process for insurance companies seeking to hike rates, saying an overhaul of the state’s market is taking too long.】

item.title: 橡树山牵头为 Vista Model N 收购提供 10 亿美元私募债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 Oak Hill Advisors 为首的一批私人信用贷款机构正在商讨提供约 10 亿美元的债务，以支持 Vista Equity Partners 收购 Model N 公司。【原文：A group of private credit lenders led by Oak Hill Advisors is in discussions to provide about $1 billion of debt to support Vista Equity Partners’ acquisition of Model N, according to people with knowledge of the matter, who asked not to be identified because the details are private.】

item.title: 对冲基金在可能的外汇干预后削减对日元的押注
item.description: 在日本当局可能介入市场以支撑日元之后，对冲基金削减了对日元的押注，降幅为 2020 年 3 月以来最大。【原文：Hedge funds slashed their bets against the yen by most since March 2020 after Japanese authorities likely stepped into the market in a bid to prop up the currency.】

item.title: 对冲基金将石油看涨押注降至八周最低
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势缓和以及基本面前景阴云密布，对冲基金放弃了对基准布伦特原油的看涨押注。【原文：Hedge funds fled bullish bets on benchmark Brent crude as easing tensions in the Middle East and a clouded fundamental outlook weigh on prices.】

item.title: 恐惧消退，华尔街抛售资产崩溃保险
item.description: 在经历了数周的戏剧性事件后，华尔街的每个角落都已恢复平静。【原文：After weeks of drama, peace is breaking out everywhere you look across Wall Street.】

item.title: 因预测美国关税将包括中国食用油，大豆油跳涨
item.description: 由于交易商押注中国使用过的食用油可能会被列入美国即将宣布的关税清单，豆油期货创下自七月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Soybean oil futures surged by the most since July as traders bet that Chinese used cooking oil may be included on the list of tariffs expected to be announced by the US.】

item.title: 推动跨山公司修改规格以提高石油价值
item.description: 包括雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）、加拿大自然资源有限公司（Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. ）和 Suncor 能源公司（Suncor Energy Inc. ）在内的石油公司正在向扩建后的跨山管道运营商施压，要求其改变某些关键规格，以提高管道所输送原油的价值。【原文：Oil companies including Chevron Corp., Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. and Suncor Energy Inc. are pressing the operators of the expanded Trans Mountain pipeline to change certain key specifications to improve the value of the crude the conduit is carrying.】

item.title: 耶伦称非银行抵押贷款公司存在金融稳定风险
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周五表示，非银行抵押贷款公司在该行业日益占据主导地位，它们构成了可能削弱金融稳定性的独特风险和脆弱性。【原文：Nonbank mortgage companies, which increasingly dominate the sector, pose unique risks and vulnerabilities that can weaken financial stability, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said Friday.】

item.title: Onex 为小型收购基金募集 7.35 亿美元资金
item.description: Onex 公司为新的短期收购基金筹集了 7.35 亿美元，这是这家加拿大私募股权公司在新任首席执行官领导下重启增长的最新举措。【原文：Onex Corp. has gathered $735 million for a new short-term buyout fund, the latest move by the Canadian private equity firm to restart growth under a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: 投资亏损后，哈佛大学将于 2022 年削减捐赠基金主管的薪酬
item.description: 哈佛大学在 2022 年削减了捐赠基金主管的薪酬，当时学校报告了六年来最严重的投资损失。【原文：Harvard University slashed pay to its endowment chief in 2022, when the school reported its worst investment losses in six years.】

item.title: 美国卫生官员斥资 1 亿美元监控禽流感
item.description: 美国卫生官员正投入 1 亿美元加强对牛禽流感疫情的监控，因为人们越来越担心禽流感的传播范围比报道的更广。【原文：US health officials are putting $100 million toward ramping up surveillance of the outbreak of bird flu in cattle amid rising concerns that it has spread more widely than has been reported.】

item.title: 顶级橙汁供应商的收成为 36 年来最差
item.description: 据研究机构 Fundecitrus 称，全球最大的橙汁出口国巴西将迎来 36 年来最糟糕的收成，因为一场热浪严重损害了农作物。【原文：Brazil, the world’s largest exporter of orange juice, is set to have its worst harvest in 36 years after a heat wave severely hurt crops, according to research group Fundecitrus.】

item.title: 英国政府加快处理 NatWest 股份的计划
item.description: 据几位熟悉内情的人士透露，英国政府正在加紧准备出售 NatWest Group Plc 的股份，因为越来越多的人希望政府能够在今年年底之前将纳税人持有的股份削减到微不足道的程度。【原文：The UK government is stepping up preparations to sell shares in NatWest Group Plc amid growing hopes it will be able to cut the taxpayer-owned stake to a negligible amount by the end of the year, according to several people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加纳重整部分贷款，启动短期债务市场
item.description: 加纳已经启动了一个短期债务交易市场，这个平台建立在八年多前创建的固定收益市场基础之上，而且是在该国根据国际货币基金组织的一项计划重组债务以使其可持续发展之际启动的。【原文：Ghana has started a market for trading short-term debt, a platform that builds on the fixed income market created more than eight years ago, and comes as the country restructures debt to make it sustainable under an International Monetary Fund program.】
